CouchDB Maven Plugin
Last Published: 2011-12-16  | Version: 0.2
Overview
  • Introduction
  • Usage
Parent Project
  • org.dthume Public
Project Documentation
  • Project Information
  • Project Reports

couchdb:get-document

Full name:

org.dthume.couchdb:couchdb-maven-plugin:0.2:get-document

Description:

Standalone goal which gets a document from Couch DB

Attributes:

  • Executes by direct invocation only.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
documentId String - (no description)
outputFile String - (no description)
Default value is: -.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
database String - ID of the database to work with.
host String - The hostname of the Couch instance.
Default value is: localhost.
password String - The password to use when communicating with the Couch instance.
port int - The port of the Couch instance.
Default value is: 5984.
scriptsDirectory String - The directory where JavaScript files are placed, relative to the webappDirectory.
Default value is: scripts.
sourceDirectory File - The directory where couchapp sources are stored.
Default value is: ${basedir}/src/main/couchapp.
targetDirectory File - The directory where couchapps are built to.
Default value is: ${project.build.directory}/couchapp.
username String - The username to use when communicating with the Couch instance.
webappDirectory File - The directory where web application files are built to.

Parameter Details

database:

ID of the database to work with.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${couchapp.database}

documentId:

(no description)
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • Expression: ${couchapp.documentId}

host:

The hostname of the Couch instance.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${couchapp.host}
  • Default: localhost

outputFile:

(no description)
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • Expression: ${couchapp.file}
  • Default: -

password:

The password to use when communicating with the Couch instance.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${couchapp.password}

port:

The port of the Couch instance.
  • Type: int
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${couchapp.port}
  • Default: 5984

scriptsDirectory:

The directory where JavaScript files are placed, relative to the webappDirectory.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${scripts}
  • Default: scripts

sourceDirectory:

The directory where couchapp sources are stored.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${couchapp.sourceDirectory}
  • Default: ${basedir}/src/main/couchapp

targetDirectory:

The directory where couchapps are built to.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: No
  • Default: ${project.build.directory}/couchapp

username:

The username to use when communicating with the Couch instance.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${couchapp.username}

webappDirectory:

The directory where web application files are built to.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${project.build.directory}/${project.build.finalName}
